website_summaries.verdict: These quality earplugs come at a great value, as buyers receive 2 sets as well as a case for under $20.
pros: Comes with 2 pairs with different levels of hearing protection and a convenient carrying case
Provide impressive sound quality by lowering volume to comfortable level but not muffling
Easy to put in and take out
cons: Takes some trial and error to learn how to properly insert them into the ear

customer_reviews.title: Work for me
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in great shape. I have tinnitus and also keep my fingers in my ears for movies. And I have small ear canals--cannot use most earbuds. Tried foam earplugs and they were totally pathetic. Got these and went to the movies. Put them in before it started. Previews, movie . . . They were comfortable, but I could hear everything well--All the dialogue, etc. On the pro side, I was not wincing and covering my ears. I wondered...are they working? During the final credits I removed them. OMG--suddenly too loud! So yes they work. Have recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn M

customer_reviews.title: I have tinnitus and haven't been going to the movies due to not having a great pair of ear plugs to reduce the noise
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I tried these for the first time last weekend at the movies. I have tinnitus and haven't been going to the movies due to not having a great pair of ear plugs to reduce the noise. These little guys are AWESOME! Thanks so much Gina
customer_reviews.author: Gina Turks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable even for small ears
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these earplugs and wore them at a concert. The plugs lowered the sound to a very comfortable (but still enjoyable) level. Conversation around me was definitely muted (in between songs), but the music from the concert was clear. I am a petite woman and have had trouble with ear buds hurting my ears because my ears are small; but after 2 hours of wearing these ear plugs, my ears were not in discomfort! I liked that there were two pairs so my husband and I could each wear them. The pouch was a nice way to carry them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Raber

customer_reviews.title: excellent value as you get 2 set of plugs and option to select db level reduction with a unique practical case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and great value as you can use the plugs depending on the noise level you are expecting. Both plug sets are operational unlike other brands that require you to switch filters but you have only one set of plugs to use at a time. Case is very easy to use unlike tubes where the plugs get stuck. One negative. Seller does not allow returns so if you buy you have to keep. I ordered 2 more sets for gifts as they were both handy and very good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha T

customer_reviews.title: A BIG help!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! These! I waitress at night and sometimes, b/t the crowds and the music, my ears ring so much after, I think I'm going crazy. I have dealt with tinnitus for a long time and the noise at work hasn't helped. These earplugs have helped immensely, I would say 100%, as far as leaving work with no added tinnitus issues. The kicker is, I can actually HEAR people at work when these are in. I wear the clear ones. Even with my hair pulled back no one really notices, and I wouldn't care even if they did-I'd rather hear than go deaf:)
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Starter Rave Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Great quality to cost ratio. I've been using these for almost a year as of this review, and they haven't let me down since. For anyone who is just starting to get into the concert/rave scene and aren't sure if they want to invest in an expensive pair of earplugs, these will do the trick. The little pouch that they come with is amazingly handy as well. That being said, I have since moved onto a more expensive pair of earplugs, which do filter out sounds while letting more music in better than these. However, for the price increase, these are still the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Z

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts with a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, I've been using them for drums. They don't really dilute the quality of sound, they just make it less loud. They also fit in the ear and don't stick out much. Easy to put in, you just pull up on your ear to open the canal and stuff it in. Great that it comes with two pairs, so you and your concert buddy can have them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller ear holes, Have no fear!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom to take her to the BTS concert.(Concert was amazing!! btw) She has sensitive ears so it was important to have something to help filter a bit of the noise. It was deafening sometimes with the screams so I know she wouldn't have been able to take it if she had nothing. According to her, these work great. She said they were comfortable in her ears(which is hard to find cuz they are small). She could still hear well but the outside noise was dampened enough that she could enjoy herself.
customer_reviews.author: B W

customer_reviews.title: Reduce loudness without negatively affecting quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always thought concerts would be more enjoyable if the volume was turned down just a little, and these do that. They do not negatively affect the sound quality just lower it. When I first put them in I didn’t think they were in because everything sounded the same, but when I went to the SugarRay concert (which btw was amazing, they may have been popular when I was 5, but they still sound the same) I could tell that they lowered the noise in a way that reduces the pain without negatively affecting my enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: RAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAHHAAH

customer_reviews.title: Even though they seemed to fit my ears fine, they barely seemed to block the sound
customer_reviews.text: Even though they seemed to fit my ears fine, they barely seemed to block the sound. I followed the direction by pulling on the ear and inserting. There is no way I would use these at a concert. I cranked my PA speakers up to 105db (not as loud as a rock concert) and these were uncomfortable from a loudness perspective. Normal foam ear plugs worked way better at that volume level. Also, the clear ones don't extend out of the ear as far as the grey ones and are extremely difficult to grab and get out. On a plus side, the bag is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ear plugs to basically tone down the deafening sound used at current movie theaters. Although I just received the ear plugs and have not been to a movie I can't tell how they will work there. However, my wife and I each tried a set while watching a loud program on our TV and both of us agreed that the sound filtered by the plugs was much better than without them.My wife said she will definitely take them to the next movie we go to.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: The plugs come with a great little case to carry both sets. I used them for the first time yesterday at church. Unfortunately our services reach decibels levels over 103. I have used wax plugs in the past which work nicely but muffle the sound. These plugs fit comfortably and allowed me to hear clearly while decreasing the volume. They were great.
customer_reviews.author: JLLo

customer_reviews.title: Great for drowning out the many conversations and helping me ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son to make band practice more bearable for him. He used them a couple times and then started leaving them at home. So, I use them now since we have an "open office concept" in our new building. Great for drowning out the many conversations and helping me focus. Super comfortable, but maybe a bit hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: These work great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! I have ADHD, so loud noises and me don't mix very well generally. I bought these so I could enjoy the sold out Garth Brooks world tour concert, and let me tell you, these things worked so damn well that I was able to sit through all four hours of the show comfortably. The sound quality was really good too! It sounded just like it would if I was listening to music with my earbuds in. And I didn't have any problems with my hearing after the concert either. Overall great product that's well worth investing in.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brand because it was a little cheaper that the Etymotic I usually use. Found them to be too hard/big and uncomfortable. In addition, the stem is too small to get a good grip on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Todd

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get out of your ear once they are in. Had to use tweasers which was freaking me out.
customer_reviews.author: John Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Win-win
customer_reviews.text: I don't often attend large concert venues these days. However, after getting tickets to a concert I decided to give these a try to avoid the after-show ear ringing. They worked great! Put them in, they were snug & comfortable and still allowed me t0 hear conversation without having to remove them. I didn't feel like it affected the quality of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays his stereo and tv so loud I can't enjoy watching with him. Today I gave them a try and we watched an entire movie and music without me leaving the room. I also have tinnitus and the ringing was not loud after wearing the ear plugs. They fit purfect and the convienent case is nice to store them in. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Salli S

customer_reviews.title: My go-to earplugs for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many of these sets over the last few riding seasons for motorcycle riding. I am always losing them. They take just enough wind & motor noise away from those all day rides so you don't have the fatigued feeling at the end of day.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The case is amazing and a must-have if you're bringing them to shows in their case - the shape is small and flat. The earbuds themselves are just as good and comfortable as my name-brand concert earplugs. I will buy again when I eventually lose these lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Works to block out noise, but also blocks out crowd vibes.
customer_reviews.text: They work exactly like advertised as long as you put them in correctly. They muffle the noises and make actual concert sounds easier to hear. However, I find that it gets so quiet with these in that I'm not as hyped up as without them. I used them for one concert, and was very focused on the music. Went to the same concert in a different city, and didn't use them, and I was able to get the crowd vibe more.
customer_reviews.author: xxclare

customer_reviews.title: Actually works! For motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are amazing! At first I was skeptical of it just blocking out the road noise but it’s true, they block out a lot and I mean a lot of the street noise while still letting me hear my engine noise as well as music coming from my cardo. So far I’ve only used the short tip because it’s so small I don’t feel it in my helmet but I have no reason to use the long tip ones since the short tip does the job extremely well. They are also very soft, comfortable, and easy to remove. I’ve even forgotten that I had them in!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Friends and I tried these at a rave, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Friends and I tried these at a rave, and they work well. I used the smaller ones and could hear people talk over the music. My friend used the bigger ones and couldn’t hear anyone talk during the music, but she could hear when music wasn’t playing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with these Rave earplugs...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the Rave ear plugs. They definitely did exactly what they claim to do -- cut down on the loud bass -- just enough -- without losing the ability to clearly hear the vocals and the rest of the band. The only downside was they were a little difficult to put in, but that may be due more to the size and shape of my ear canals instead of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass Dumbrille

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cancel correct decibels
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They cancel out just the right range of decibels and are pretty comfortable. I wore them to a 6 hour show and they only started making my ears a little sore towards the last hour. I have small ears though.
customer_reviews.author: D. SHORE

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should get some decent ear plugs because I'm old.
customer_reviews.text: Figured I should upgrade to some fancier ear plugs as an adult (as opposed to my $0.50 disposable ones I always grab at Walgreens in a hurry before a concert). These things are pretty cool. I'm partial to the clear 19 decibel ones - I can still hear conversations and the music is clear. Took me a minute to figure out what the instructions meant about straightening out your ear canal for best performance, but once I figured it out, it actually did make a world of difference. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Claire

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Gift
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. We have a new organist n Church who plays so loudly that it could set one's teeth on edge. These Rave High Fidelity Ear Plugs take the edge off when he plays, but does not diminish the rest of the service. Thank you so much. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Wehle

customer_reviews.title: Will never go to a show without these again
customer_reviews.text: Just wore these (25 db filters) to warped tour- walked in front of some speakers and didnt realize it lol seriously these were 100% worth the money, great sound quality, and aside from that I was there for about 5 hours and have no tinnitus/ringing in my ears after- I will never go to a show without these again.
customer_reviews.author: keepfrozen

customer_reviews.title: "Hear the music without hearing lost."
customer_reviews.text: The decibel reduction is great and will be indispensable at concert venues. I can even use them while playing drums which is even more rewarding. I will definitely be recommending your product to others. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Gudger

customer_reviews.title: great for motorcycle riding, wish they had a neck strap
customer_reviews.text: Having tinnitus is rough when riding motorcycles! These earplugs are great for reducing the noise, but allowing traffic sounds to still be heard. I really wish they had a neck strap, and I nearly chose another pair because of that. Do these work better than the multitude of others offered? I can't say, but they definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: I have used these several times and liked them enough to buy a set for another guy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these several times and liked them enough to buy a set for another guy in my band who complains about his difficulty hearing himself over the drums. I only gave them 4 stars because the posts are small and they can be difficult to insert and remove from my ears. My Fender plugs have a longer post and are easier to manipulate, but I think the sound quality of these is better. Also note, the plugs arrived on time and in good shape. I like the holder they come in, and I wear them on my key chain so they are always available.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I think these cancel out noise pretty decently; however, I would spend a little bit more money next time for comfortability.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: A happy purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I currently use them when I dry my hair with a very loud blow dryer. They work much better than cotton stuffed in my ears. I keep them in my purse for the occasional too loud movie, or any other too loud event. I can still hear my radio/TV while utilizing them.
customer_reviews.author: BUMPSEY

customer_reviews.title: Effective and practical
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these ear plugs for a couple weeks and they make a significant different on the freeway as well as on shorter / slower rides. I especially like the little pouch that's flexible and fits everywhere. I'm glad there are 2 sets of plugs because I already lost one of them. I might be looking at a set with a neck cord next time but I'm not convinced yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice. I use them both at work and in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. I use them both at work and in concerts. They're discrete and efficient, plus the case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stein

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I love those ear plugs. I bought them to use at work since I work in a place with a lot of different high pitched and continuous noises. I usually use the clear ones with the lesser filter which is sufficient. The good thing about these ear plugs is that they’re very comfortable, great quality and allow you to still hear and communicate with other people around you. Definitely recommend it for a lot of different uses and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get two levels of protection with the two different ear plugs.
customer_reviews.text: The Rave high fidelity ear plugs are very effective at cancelling the unwanted high frequency noise. But leaving the subtle tones of the personal conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if there's something wrong with the plugs or ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if there's something wrong with the plugs or my ears, but they don't seem to fit properly. Some noise becomes amplified with them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia Davidovich

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Work
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about ordering . I have small ears and have trouble with earplugs hurting . These are very comfortable and do not bother me . I have tried both sizes and am very please . With loud music they work just fine for me . Very happy I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great earplugs! It’s my first pair because I finally realized I need to start protecting my ears at shows and stuff. A great choice, I especially appreciate the cute little pouch it comes in. They’re really comfortable, and I can still hear music clearly, as well as any conversation from people near me!
customer_reviews.author: Allysha Tabisola

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I was underwhelmed by this product. I don’t have many earplug experiences to compare but thought this was only a bit better than the foam plugs you can get 50 pair for less that $10.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Made my hearing worse.
customer_reviews.text: They made my hearing worse. You can still hear sound but it’s deep in your ear so it damages deep inside your ear. Terrible I use them for driving a semi they are terrible as in damage your inner hearing more.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: My go to earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These fit nice in my ears and are a great value. Comes with two pairs and a slim case. Bought a few of these for friends already. Yeah loud concerts!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: No pain, no gain?
customer_reviews.text: They work well to block out noise. Unfortunately, they are not comfortable enough to wear daily. I use them at night when sleeping, and they began to hurt my meatus so badly that I had to switch back to the soft foam ones for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S. K.

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: Pouch is SUPER convenient to pop open with one hand, although I'm not sure how long it will hold up as it seems to not quite close all the way after a weekend of use, not major, it still does the job fine, it's just not as it was when first purchased. Doesn't come with a clip which is unfortunate. Ear plugs worked fine. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Weren't perfect, but definitely helped for festival. Would recommend for the price. They were pretty comfortable and the pouch was perfect to keep up with them. I would give 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: These ear plugs were perfect. I was able to enjoy all the music ...
customer_reviews.text: Just saw the Red Hot Chili Peppers live. I had been searching for a long while for a pair for my wife and I. She has much more concert experience than I. These ear plugs were perfect. I was able to enjoy all the music that I love without any of the ear ringing or issues after the show. An excellent experience overall!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what they said. I use the 19db one and you can still hear what you need to hear.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: EMD worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these earbuds to an electronic music festival and OMG, these little things are worth their weight in gold! The quality was great, meaning I could here the music but without the high pitched audio. Thanks for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for Christmas gift. My mother’s hearing has been sensitive. She use these at a venue were the noise level was higher with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: These are OK
customer_reviews.text: They worked OK but the sound was kind of muffled compared to without them. They definitely did reduce the noise however. I went to 3 concerts in the same week with them, one was extremely loud, and I didn't have any ringing in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Veritatis Splendor

customer_reviews.title: My go-to earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to earplugs for concerts or when going to the club because they filter the noise so well and fit so snug. The case they provide isn’t as good as the previous keychain capsule they had because this current case has a chance for the earplugs to fall out in your pocket and you may lose them as you take items out. But the actual earplugs are A+!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the sound quality clear while still cutting back on noise level
customer_reviews.text: Still able to protect my ears and hear and understand the words being sung at concerts. I love the storage bag they come with. Easy and quick to access and store earplugs and makes them easy to store in purse or car for the next concert. We also used these at an air show and they definitely cut back on the engines roars.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Provides great protection, but definitely takes away a little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Provides great protection, but definitely takes away a little bit of clarity in the sound of vocals. You'll be able to hear the actual music great, but the vocals might sound muted.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The rave ear plugs work as advertised. Reduce unwanted noise while still being able to hold a conversation or listen to others speaking. Easy to use and packed in a easy to access case.
customer_reviews.author: Blford

customer_reviews.title: These ear plugs worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: These little ear plugs worked for me! I used them at a outside rock concert with 3 pretty loud bands. Usually after a show it takes about 2/3 days to hear properly due to already having partial hearing loss (thanks to these shows). I can hear perfectly the next day! The little pouch was handy to keep the plugs in which easily fit in my pocket. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Hill

customer_reviews.title: They work well and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These really have met my expectations. I'm often walking near loud traffic, and these help take the edge of the noise without making me feel totally cut off from my surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs.
customer_reviews.text: These are great earplugs and fit very well. Cancelled out noise quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a Lady Gaga concert on Monday and they worked beautifully. They were so easy to insert
customer_reviews.text: I wore these to a Lady Gaga concert on Monday and they worked beautifully. They were so easy to insert, stayed in place all night and did a wonderful job of keeping out the loud noises. The sound was not muffled at all just muted which is exactly what I wanted. 2 songs in, my Sister asked if I had more ear plugs and I gave her my second set of Rave's to try. She loved them as well and enjoyed the rest of the concert without any ear pain or issues. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rehbein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are great for protecting your hearing but also being able to enjoy live music. Comfortable and designed well!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Save your hearing
customer_reviews.text: I ride motorcycles and these are valuable in helping cut the wind noise but allows me to hear the communications in my helmet Bluetooth other important sounds.
customer_reviews.author: PaBusa52

customer_reviews.title: probably saved my ears
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality was at a rave and they did an amazing job of keeping the sound at a reasonable level, while not diminishing the quality of the experience the music was still plenty loud with the plugs in and I removed them for a few seconds to see the difference and I couldn't believe how much louder it was without them would recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Went to a heavy metal concert tonight and left with my hearing! I have longer nails so it was easy enough to remove them. Voices in the crowd without the music sound so weird but in a conversation you can understand them talking if you’re close enough. Small pouch is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Work fantastically!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my roommate often travel around and go to raves and music festivals constantly. Her ears are sensitive to the bass and these helped tremendously! Only downside it that they are easy to loose but they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brady

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend these at all. They do not keep any noise out and once you get them in your ears you will need needlenose pliers to get them out. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Posey

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: Used the eargasm plugs before these and they would always fall out when I rode my motorcycle. These work amazing and fit in my ear perfect for more than 50% less. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Quality item!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, perfect protection. Sound was quieter, with no distortion. We were able to enjoy a 300 member marching band concert in an indoor auditorium, and left without headaches. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: FWhite

customer_reviews.title: Love these ear plugs!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, sleek, easy to wear, and block out harmful sounds to your hears so you don't have ringing ears at the end of the night when you get home from the show! Also love the little carrying case they come in! Bought myself and my partner a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Olson-Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to go to a Metal Music festival. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go to a Metal Music festival. Watched 28 hours of music in three days, didn't even get tiniest bit of tinnitus. As far as I'm concerned these things are a miracle of modern science!
customer_reviews.author: D. Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Right off the bat they are very comfortable! I have a smaller ear canal so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I plan on using these for Coachella so I haven't tested them out fully yet. Right off the bat they are very comfortable! I have a smaller ear canal so I was worried about these fitting in my ears. They both fit great and seem to block out a lot of harsh sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: The concert sounded great and so did my ears the next day
customer_reviews.text: I went to a Metallica concert in Detroit. I already have hearing loss in my left ear so I want to protect my right ear. Anyways I put the clear one in my left ear and the dark one in my right ear. The concert sounded great and so did my ears the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Did their job
customer_reviews.text: Went to a pretty loud show and walked out without damage to my ears. I personally like the clear filter the most. Only kinda "Complaint" that I have is that they're a bitch to get out of your ears, which is a true testament to how snug they fit!
customer_reviews.author: John Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Actually quite comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I need ear plugs at the movies because the sound is so friggin' loud. At first they didn't seem to work once I snuggled them in a bit...yes they did.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Vercoe

customer_reviews.title: Great seal
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep water out of my ears whenever I wash my hair. These fit my tiny ear canals without major slippage
customer_reviews.author: Radiance79

customer_reviews.title: Military funerals
customer_reviews.text: I’m in military funerals honors and fire blank rifle rounds for the 21 gun salute almost daily. These are perfect for protecting my hearing whilst also being discreet. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Saw U2 on the Joshua Tree 30th anniversary tour and ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw U2 on the Joshua Tree 30th anniversary tour and these things were a godsend. My ears would have been ringing for days without these things. Recommending these to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: too large
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but I have tried to put them in and they seem to be too large for my ear canal
customer_reviews.author: lolo916

customer_reviews.title: Wore these on the rail for EDC
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on the rail for some heavy dubstep sets during Electric Daisy Carnival, and they honestly saved my life! It made the experience so much more enjoyable, and I still heard the music perfectly fine. Recommended it to all my festival goers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great and the pouch is great for storing.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for concerts - cut the volume, but don't sacrifice sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The ear plugs definitely help cut the volume, but not the sound quality, at concerts. The ear plugs don't stick that far out of my ear and I appreciate the discreteness. The little black pouch is also slick. Would recommend these to anyone looking for some affordable high fidelity ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: LoveTheNorthwest

customer_reviews.title: ... been using the white ones - it is working fine and it helps to block out extremely loud music ...
customer_reviews.text: Personally I've only been using the white ones - it is working fine and it helps to block out extremely loud music (Usually use it at indoor EDM raves) and I was still able to hear my friends talking to me while wearing it. Unfortunately the black one is a little too big for my ears so I can only utilize one pair (white) of the 2 in this.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Great ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. blocks out a lot of the background noise. fits in ears nicely
customer_reviews.author: Colo girl

customer_reviews.title: PROTECT YOUR EARS WITH THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for music festivals! Love that the pieces are interchangeable. I cannot go to any festivals or concerts without this! Definitely makes a big difference after using it - no more ringing in your ears after!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! Amazing quality and most people don't notice I'm wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied. Too bad
customer_reviews.text: I attend music concerts with loud music. I thought these ear plugs would reduce the loudness and still let the music come through, as the description stated. They didn't really reduce the loudness much at all, and somewhat muffled the music. Not satisfied. Too bad, I really wanted these to be as amazing as the description sounded.
customer_reviews.author: ErinYorba Linda

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son, when he visit his sister at her concert it's was too loud so, he tend to get aggravated. so far its working
customer_reviews.author: anna b

customer_reviews.title: Good sizes, good sound dampening
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is comfortable for hours of use. Small enough to be added to your keychain and still fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear at a concert. They were as advertised. We were in the 4th row center, we could hear everything clearly but not at the levels that it would have been. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: David Briley

customer_reviews.title: These Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Work well and the little pouch is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: R. Callicotte

customer_reviews.title: Ear No Evil 🙉
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 family members who are very sensitive to loud sounds. They are why I decided to try the Rave Plugs. They are very pleased with them. Now I can "turn it up, turn it up, the radio...."
customer_reviews.author: Brian F. McGee

customer_reviews.title: These work so well. You can clearly hear the ...
customer_reviews.text: These work so well. You can clearly hear the music but just without leaving a concert with ringing ears.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Got them for work and really happy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work and I love them. Its been pretty noisy around the place I work and these cut out a lot of the random convos that distracted me.
customer_reviews.author: Dolemite954

customer_reviews.title: Awesome low profile ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality ear plugs, but they are a bit small for larger ears. They just about fit me. They go a little deeper than I’d like. It’s no fault of the product, just my size.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L.

customer_reviews.title: Saves your hearing from being damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Protects your ears from loud sound. Essential for live music. Drops the decibels without losing the enjoyment of the musical experience.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Tiplady

customer_reviews.title: What?
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I can't hear you. I have these amazing noise cancelling ear plugs in. I find it easy to concentrate with these and I love them. Great to protect your hearing!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work and are comfortable. Don't know what else to say.
customer_reviews.author: cameron m. foreman

customer_reviews.title: Case isn’t good.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the included case. One of the gray earplugs fell out while I was working. It could be in my house or 3 hours away....
customer_reviews.author: Dpec3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I always end up losing one & come back to reorder more.
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I was not using them sooner when riding a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Just enough reduction
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in a concert, and the little carrying case fit nice in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: magsb

product_meta.title: Rave High Fidelity Ear Plugs: HiFi Hearing Protection for Music, Concert; Noise Reducing Earplugs Help Stop Tinnitus; Ear Buds Filter Noise for Ear Protection (Black Case) (2 Pairs - 19/25 Decibel)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackHearing protection that filters the noise, not the experience.

Set contains 1 carrying case, and 2 pairs of ear plugs (1 short stem, 1 long stem). The filters are interchangeable and fit snugly into either the short stem, or long stem ear plug. The filters offer an average volume reduction of 19 decibels (Clear Filter), or 25 decibels (White Filter). 

Rave Ear Plugs were specifically designed for those who want to enjoy an experience while protecting their hearing. The soft 3 layer design has a small filter that reduces noise 19db (Clear Filter), or 25db (White Filter). The Ear Plug design is comfortable, light weight, and easy to wear for extended periods. The short stub design keeps the ear plugs out of sight, and the soft silicone material keeps them out of mind. 

Protect your ear plugs with the black case that can slip in your pocket or hook on your key ring, etc. Protect your hearing by reducing sound, not clarity. With a precision filter, damaging noise is reduced but speech and sound remain clear. Foam ear plugs are notorious for muffling speech and sound; however you won't have that problem while wearing Rave Ear Plugs. 

Noise reducing ear plugs can help protect your hearing for a lifetime. They can and are recommended to be used for any of the following applications: Concerts, Festivals, Musicians, Band Practice, Theater, Events, etc. 

You no longer have to compromise quality for safety. Hear the world for a lifetime! Add Rave Ear Plugs to your cart now so you don't have to add hearing aids later.
feature_bullets: PRESERVE SOUND QUALITY while protecting yourself from tinnitus: Filter acoustics, and lowers decibel volume equally. Does not muffle sound, or speech like foam does. STANDARD SIZE
INTERCHANGEABLE HIFI FILTERS 19db (Clear Filter), 25db (White Filter) allows you to customize to fit your needs best. Filters can be used in both the short stem, and long stem earplugs.
LOW PROFILE DESIGN coupled with a soft, comfortable feel. Truly leaves this product out of sight, and out of mind.
AVERAGE VOLUME REDUCTION OF 19 DECIBELS (Clear Filter), or 25 DECIBELS (White Filter): Is enough to protect casual to heavy concert goers, or musicians.
EASY TO CLEAN, HYPOALLERGENIC SILICONE MATERIAL: This is an overlooked feature; however it is essential in keeping your equipment clean to reduce the risk of infection.
